# version

**Instance Property**

The cookie’s version.

## Declaration

```swift
var version: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

Version 0 maps to “old-style” Netscape cookies. Version 1 maps to [https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6265] cookies.

## Getting cookie metadata

- **name**: The cookie’s name.
- **value**: The cookie’s string value.
title: version
